typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SequenceNumber as long,
		Offset as string,
		EnqueuedTimeUtc as string,
		SystemProperties as string,
		Properties as string,
		Body as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	limit: 100,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> ExternalNotificationEventHubFileDatasource
ExternalNotificationEventHubFileDatasource parse(Vin = Body ? (Vin as string),
		{CommandId } = Body ? (CommandId as string),
		Id = Body ? (Id as string),
		NotificationType = Body ? (NotificationType as string),
		MessageType = Body ? (MessageType as string),
		Date = Body ? (TimeStamp as string),
		UserId = Body ? (UserId as string),
		Data = Body ? (Data as string),
		ExternalNotfication = Body ? (Id as string, Vin as string, CommandId as string, NotificationType as string, MessageType as string, TimeStamp as string, UserId as string, Data as string),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> ParseExternalNotificationObject
ParseExternalNotificationObject derive(Id = ExternalNotfication.Id,
		CommandId = ExternalNotfication.CommandId,
		MessageType = ExternalNotfication.MessageType,
		NotificationType = case(ExternalNotfication.NotificationType == 'CommandResponse', 1, case(ExternalNotfication.NotificationType == 'Notification', 2, case(ExternalNotfication.NotificationType == 'Alert', 3, case(ExternalNotfication.NotificationType == 'ServiceNotification', 4, case(ExternalNotfication.NotificationType == 'ServiceManagement', 5, 0))))),
		Date = toTimestamp(substring(ExternalNotfication.TimeStamp, 1, 10)+substring(ExternalNotfication.TimeStamp, 12, 8) , 'yyyy-MM-ddHH:mm:ss'),
		UserId = ExternalNotfication.UserId,
		Data = ExternalNotfication.Data,
		Vin = ExternalNotfication.Vin) ~> ConvertDateTimeAndNotificationType
ConvertDateTimeAndNotificationType sink(input(
		Vin as string,
		Id as string,
		CommandId as string,
		NotificationType as integer,
		MessageType as string,
		TimeStamp as timestamp,
		UserId as string,
		Data as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Vin,
		Id,
		CommandId,
		NotificationType,
		MessageType,
		UserId,
		Data,
		TimeStamp = Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> InsertDataIntoSqlServcer
